website_summaries.verdict: Contoured to fit a woman's body while providing additional protection underneath a wetsuit.
pros: Fits like a glove and protects even better
Provides UV protection in addition to keeping users warm throughout water activities
cons: Some customers seek a better quality material

customer_reviews.title: great for swimming
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm 5'8'', ordered XXL and the size is perfect neither small nor large. Even though it is dive skin, still somehow helps to keep body temperature (much better than swim suit). Last but not least, I LOVE the rose color, looks very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Jiao

customer_reviews.title: so don't buy one size up like most rash guards require
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bigger than expected, so don't buy one size up like most rash guards require.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jetsking
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this rash guard I use it to ride our stand up jet ski I kept getting rubbed raw by the padding but this outfit worked out very well. It stayed tight to my body and prevented any burns. I have only used it once so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beingme

customer_reviews.title: and it fits great! I plan to wear it under my dive ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9", 165 lbs. I ordered an XL, and it fits great! I plan to wear it under my dive suit in Cozumel this June as a protection from my suit; I seem to have a slight neoprene allergy, so I am hoping this layer will help prevent the hives I get from wearing my dive suit! : )
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this tall lady
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ tall, 36D bust and I ordered size L. It looks really good and fits perfectly. I wonder if this would be too long on a shorter woman! I plan to use it for scuba, so we’ll see how it holds up after having equipment on and salt water. But so far so good! Love it, makes my butt look good lol
customer_reviews.author: Bridget G

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy something like this online but after reading reviews and the sizing chart, I managed to get the perfect size. I'm big busted and short so I was worried about it being too small in some places and not in others. I went with the XL and it fits great. It arrived quickly and is exactly what I was looking for. I was super happy that the padded linings for the bra area slip right out as they were a bit much for me. It's a nice option. While I haven't used this in the water yet, I'm super happy with my purchase and would recommend the product so far!
customer_reviews.author: KrisS

customer_reviews.title: Had an issue- Company reached out and fixed it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little big. I wore it one time under my wetsuit and the words are already peeling pretty bad. Would recommend only as a cheap alternative to a nicer rash guard. Revision: They reached out after my issue and sent me out a new replacement one! Excellent customer service. Will try out the replacement and follow up with how it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! FAST shipping.
customer_reviews.text: My son has medical issues that make sun and heat a big problem for him. We decided to try getting this for to see if it helps. The material is thinner than expected (in a good way!!!) Its a lot like a swim shirt material and so it fits, but has room to grow a little and stretch, he LOVES the look of it because he feels like a surfer!!!! It is well made, got here crazy fast! Fantastic quality, amazing price and we can't wait to get it to the beach!!! Thank you!!!! You've help us make it a little easier for him to enjoy being outside without getting sick!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Fabric and Seams
customer_reviews.text: These skins didn't make it all the way through a week of diving. Fabric tore at base of zipper and in underarm seams. Maybe an okay rash guard for something like stand-up paddle-boarding but definitely not robust enough to wear under a BCD for scuba.
customer_reviews.author: SMD ChE

customer_reviews.title: Noxious fumes
customer_reviews.text: This suit smelled so strongly of chemical fumes, I couldn't even try it on. Could still smell it after resealing bag and shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Victorine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the men's size XL and I am 5'11" tall 195 lbs and the fit is good. Using for scuba diving in very warm waters where thermal features are not as important to me as protection from ocean irritations and sunburn. This skin performs quite well. I give it four stars because the zipper needs to be a bit longer and I feel like I am going to tear it if not careful putting on and off. For the price this does a good job and I would recommend for light to medium duty use.
customer_reviews.author: Yetimonster

customer_reviews.title: It's a great Dive Suit but...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that I got a suit to fit me, looks great on me so I use it for my water aerobic class, the water is to cold for me and that is why I bought it. It's a great dive suit but my only complaint is since you can wear it without a bathing suite under it, the suit has pads which is fine if you got boobs that sit up but if you don't you are left hanging and the pads doesn't do any good without support.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: It looks and fits GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my upcoming Aruba trip. I burn easily and want to be sure I can spend some time on the beach and in the water without worrying too much about the sun. It fits and looks amazing. My wife loves the way it looks on me too! I’m very happy so far. I hope it wears well while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for diving
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic in my recent dive. I wore this under my wetsuit when diving a 50 degree quarry. It kept me a little warmer and was easy to put on. It’s a great price and will definitely be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Didnt quite fit
customer_reviews.text: Loved design and look. But waist too wide. It stood out away from my tummy and sides making me look very boxy with no hips or butt. It didnt hug into the waistline and lower back from my hips and bubble behind. I am 5’8” a 36 26 42 and 134lbs with a fit build. i got the size Large. In the Grey w Black n Silver foil design... which is stunning btw. Am going to return, and sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: SMV

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly, good material
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2, I normally wear size S, I bought size S , it fits perfect. It’s thin but not too thin, good for me for swimming Outdoor pool because I don’t want to be tan. I wish they have more color. I bought black, and every one calls me black cat 😄
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I needed a rashguard for sun protection. I bought a large for 5’6” at 150 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: timetoretire

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wear a size 16/18W, 5’7’ in height, XXL fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard for under your wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic full suit for under wet suit and made the getting on and off so easy! Plus it kept me from burning in the Caribbean sun before, after and between dives! But it was comfortable and light enough to wear it without overheating.
customer_reviews.author: MT Geri

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome the best one I got in my 16 years diving life ! It runs a little big ! I usually wear large had to return it and get medium
customer_reviews.author: sally okail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality was good but not a great fit for me I tried both xl and xxl according to my height and size chart. Both were too big.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Protects my skin from the sun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 more this year. Wear these for jet skiing. They are great! Fit is great and looks sexy. I’ve tried other brands and this is my favorite for fit and comfort. Works well under my wetsuit as well. I don’t have to wear sunscreen underneath so that’s a huge plus! Not sure they advertise as sun protective clothing but I’ve had no issues In 2 years and I burn easy. I’m 5’5” 126 lbs and order the small. The breast pads work ok. I wear a bikini underneath but have worn it without as well. I guess it would depend on how comfortable one is with their wobbly bits.
customer_reviews.author: CRW

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality but workable
customer_reviews.text: The product met my need, however the manufacturing was a bit flawed. The garment had bunches of threads sticking out, and bad stitching in various sections as if made in a rush. I also thought it would be a bit thicker, but the thickness was not an issue for me. The threads were easily fixed with a scissors and close inspection, however I was unpleased to have my brand new garment require me to mend it as soon as I open the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best money I spent for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this! We snorkeled every day for a week in Grand Cayman. I didn't have to worry about sunscreen, was not concerned about how I look in my bathing suit, and received several compliments and requests for where I purchased it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ulm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who lives in Cozumel Mexico and works as a scuba diving instructor and dive master. She loves this dive skin and wears it every single day. She finds it to be just enough for diving in fairly warm water versus her 3mm wet suit. I think she also likes the way it fits and it is flattering on her. She gets a lot of compliments too.
customer_reviews.author: AET

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to return
customer_reviews.text: This was not really flattering in a size 16 but it fit. I returned it in favor of one with long sleeves and short legs. However the only free return option is to physically drop it off at my local return center which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: fits great although the cups are indeed too high as other ...
customer_reviews.text: well made, fits great although the cups are indeed too high as other reviews mentioned. But the padding is removable and fits much better without them. The fabric in that area without the padding is still thick enough to...suppress visible nipples which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable and has a bra that supports very well, it keeps me safe from the sun rash , it gives me full coverage and looks chic and sexy at the same time. Two things I need to change if I could: the transparent parts at the arms and at the back allows the sun to get in giving me a different color, and the big zionor writing in the front gets cracked after many washes. This is my second time to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherine Imam

customer_reviews.title: Well Made / Good Design
customer_reviews.text: This Body Suit looks good and appears to be well made. The fit is as expected. I matched my height and weight with the chart information and ordered an XL. I am happy with this purchase. The bodysuit will get a real work on our next visit to the water. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: AMA 5326

customer_reviews.title: worst material
customer_reviews.text: Horrible material, very thin and just for a single use the material started wearing out as in pictures . pls dont be fooled by positive reviews. Disappointed with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Might not fit if you’re tall
customer_reviews.text: For a shorter person, I’m 5,4 but any taller the foot and finger straps would be too tight. Boob pads and position way too high. Got sun tan right through the light grey forearm area. Held up for a week of ocean swimming and using less sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: awh

customer_reviews.title: Should of got a size smaller then what they recommended
customer_reviews.text: There sizing chart did not work for my body size! I am an avg 5’10” 180lb guy ! Zipper blew out first week of use! Still was usable but cheap stitching
customer_reviews.author: Scott Myers

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 9" 135lbs. Ordered a large and it was a great fit. I'm in Canada so our pool is still frozen, no opportunity to have feedback when garment is in water. It's sporty, sexy and practical. I had melenoma and am kinda scared of the sun, so this is a great design in my opinion. too shy to share photo
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and with a low price tag
customer_reviews.text: It is not one of the fancy or pretty rash guards that are out there and the material may be a bit thin and sheer when stretched BUT - it works PERFECTLY for what I purchased it to do. I struggle to get into my wetsuit when diving and putting this on first makes it significantly easier!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Wash in gentle cycle
customer_reviews.text: So I'm very satisfied with this product, extremely, However after wearing it 4 times in a month and then washing it the fabric started to fuzz. Disappointing but I'm satisfied and happy about the fit How I look in it and the purpose it serves.
customer_reviews.author: R'tonia

customer_reviews.title: Sleek dip in the water
customer_reviews.text: The suit is comfortable and easy to get in and out. I wore the zipper in the front and in back with no problems. It provides that extra layer of warmth and protection from the jellies. Compliments from fellow snorkelers and divers!
customer_reviews.author: FeliniVega

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice full day body swimsuit! The foot elastic on mine broke after 3 times wearing it, but the seller replaced it and the second one is good! I really like how it fit! I got a small and I’m 5.1 and 105 lb. I would like to buy a pink one too, but they don’t have it yet! I hope they will!
customer_reviews.author: Lavinia

customer_reviews.title: Maybe size down.  M for a 5'5 134 was way too long
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool, but I sorta felt like a super hero. I'm 5'5 134lbs and with asports bra I have a 37 1/2 Bust. I bought a large - it was too long (probably by about 3 inches) I think a small would have just been a better choice overall. The boob pads are kinda terribly done, but you can remove them. But it felt good on.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return, probably too late.
customer_reviews.text: Tags are still on. Haven’t used it yet because I didn’t realize how big & bold the lettering is. Too embarrassed to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Product was well-designed and comfortable, however it seemed overpriced for what it was. If you need a rashguard really, this was a pretty good one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jellyfish protection
customer_reviews.text: Box jellyfish are a predictable nuisance after the full moon. I bought this so I wouldn’t have to give up my ocean swims. First trial was this AM. Fit well. Easy to get on. Elastic straps stop it from riding up the arms or legs. Most importantly another swimmer was stung twice. I did fine. A good product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer RW

customer_reviews.title: Good protection and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this for snorkeling as well as kite boarding. Great protection and she gets asked all the time where she got it. It’s very attractive and form fitting at a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Fits bigger than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and 150lbs their chart said XL so I bought the XL as I didn't want it to be short. Pretty sure I could have gone with the L as its got a LOOOT of room. Otherwise it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: RMMc

customer_reviews.title: Good fit Good value
customer_reviews.text: True fit when consulting the size chart first. I normally wear large. XL is what was suggested and it's a good fit. Have not used it for snorkeling yet. I will use it in Indonesia and Australia in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection From Sun's UV Rays!
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel, comfort, style and fit of this skin suit. And it looks very flattering on! I wear it for an outdoor water aerobics class for protection from the sun's UV rays. I do not feel overheated during my workout because it is lightweight. I plan to wear it underneath my wet suit during the colder season to keep warm in the outdoor pool. It also enables me to take off the wet suit with ease. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for aqua aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the full body swimsuit to wear to aqua aerobics. It provides the protection and coverage I need to participate in water sports during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Monsoon Grey

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a real rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Sizing way off. Size down. However this isn't a real rash guard . It's very sheer especially when your ending over😁😳 This is very cheaply made and would never hold up to the ocean. If you want a flattering suit to swim in a pool in ,than this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: always hopeful2

customer_reviews.title: Read the size chart
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 160lbs and purchased the XL. It fit very well, and would fit someone heavier than me by a bit. The color is flattering and didn't draw attention to my size. I get a rash when my skin is exposed to the sun for long periods, and this suit was the perfect option for me to go river rafting in. I probably looked a little odd among all of the bikinis, but it didn't bother anyone else, and I'm sun-rash and sunburn free!
customer_reviews.author: Shop1

customer_reviews.title: Some wear visible, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used for diving and it worked good for the price. After two dives, some wear was visible on the shoulders from the BC Jacket. Would have liked it to be a little thicker and more durable, but great product for the price. Made 6 total dives with it and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish Rash guard
customer_reviews.text: I used this rash gard for swiming ,its looks great. And easy to put on, followed the size chart and ordered Large,it Fits nice, but I think a Medium would have worked great,and more fitting. for reference, am 5 7" , and 134 lbs..
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Good for warm water dives
customer_reviews.text: Very thin but perfect for sting and scrape protection in ward water. Flattering design.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie O.

customer_reviews.title: simple and light
customer_reviews.text: very tight to the body, I mean you can suggest one size more, I have the small size but I would have preferred Medium size since it is difficult to remove, especially since the zipper is on the back and very small, it is nice but very tight, also if you want the blows not to hurt much, suggest something that padding this definitely is not
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Fino

customer_reviews.title: Product Good Quality and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel, texture and fit of the product. Good value, attractive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Baker

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is too short
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well made except for the zipper. It's too short. You have to be Houdini to get in and out of it. I ordered a size larger than needed Asher well. I'm sure things will start to RIP/ tear due to the extra stress of all the pulling needed to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ddoc

customer_reviews.title: Hate the waist stitching forgot to return before trip
customer_reviews.text: I meant to return this before I went on my trip but forgot. I did not like this suit. Smaller than advertised. Hate the big logo name on it. The stitching at the waist was uncomfortable and made it feel funny.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: A fit review
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the size as I haven't yet used the product yet. After reading all of the reviews, I selected a large. I am 5'8" weigh 138 with measurements of 34B, 31 and 38. The large fit perfectly. It was long enough and stretched enough to accommodate my shape and zip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy3

customer_reviews.title: Its true to size.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect. It's true to size. Don't buy a size up. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Annyh C

customer_reviews.title: Durability and great zipper
customer_reviews.text: Purchased same product over 15 years ago needed a new one purchased online same material and quality Perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Don't do this
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. It looks like someone had a cheap sewing machine and put the pieces together. It was flimsy. It would definitely NOT keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product wears out a little quicker under a 7mm wetsiut but I love it and was worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Utych

customer_reviews.title: Great design, very flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1", 103lbs, 32D, 24" waist. The design and fabric are very flattering. I ordered a few of these body suits at the same time and this came in second but only because it was just slightly bigger than another I had ordered. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SubWoman

customer_reviews.title: grey patch is of inferior quality.
customer_reviews.text: overall the suit is good and comfortable but the silve/grey strips in the suit has developed lint and rough surface after 5 swims.
customer_reviews.author: Waqar Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight for me , I don’t feel very comfortable and it dries up pretty slow, makes me feel a bit cold.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate buy now
customer_reviews.text: I have sun cancer and this wet suite projects me from the sun. It’s awesome to put on and not worry about the sun. It also keeps you cool. Light weight and comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Shelly McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Suit
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. foot loops help to keep the legs in place. Oh very sexy too.
customer_reviews.author: RLJR

customer_reviews.title: Flattering skin.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable skin. Also has padding in the chest area which adds curves for a women when most skins or wetsuits flatten you out. I love my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leia Shae

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a lot of different full body rash guards for kayaking,skimming and snorkeling but this one is the best! Fits perfect 5’3 and 150s
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha75

customer_reviews.title: The letters are huge.
customer_reviews.text: It fit properly, and was comfortable. The large letters were not flattering. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: maxx

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: its very nice, fits perfectly and it protects very well from the UV
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: Surfer
customer_reviews.text: Wore it during my surfing camp in Costa Rica .... love it
customer_reviews.author: Yanina

customer_reviews.title: Body swim wear
customer_reviews.text: Well made but I ordered the 2x and that's my fault so I will later order a smaller fit.
customer_reviews.author: germinal

customer_reviews.title: Fits me perfectly I’am 5’1 108 Lbs
customer_reviews.text: This full rash guard fits great and has a sexy look to it! Great value for a good quality item!
customer_reviews.author: mia sumlin

customer_reviews.title: so pretty
customer_reviews.text: i am 5'3" and 120 pounds. I ordered medium size and fit good. The rash guard is little too long but it is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Happy life

customer_reviews.title: Good fit - but a bit thin
customer_reviews.text: Nice product - good fit- but a bit thin - to be seen how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Skin suit is my sun screen
customer_reviews.text: When participating in water sports on long sunny days I want some protection from the sun and I don't like to worry about wearing sunscreen. This does the job for me. The suit is high quality and fits like a glove. I am glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Nice fit easy to get on and off cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon Turner

customer_reviews.title: The best swimsuit so far
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a full body swimsuit. Been using it for more than 2 months now. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and 3 friends bought on my recommendation. Fits well, very easy on -off, comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J White

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Large XX is really size medium
customer_reviews.text: Says LGXX. Not for a european male. Maybe a lg xx Chinese or Japanese
customer_reviews.author: sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Wish the zipper came down lower to make it easier to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: KwSuki

customer_reviews.title: Used for snorkeling multiple times per day, three days in a row.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for snorkeling three days in a row for multiple snorkeling trip per day. It was awesome. Definitely comfortable and dries fast. Even when it was still wet, I was able to get in and out of it easily for my morning and afternoon snorkeling experience.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great & will b perfect for warm weather dives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection while surfing warm days!
customer_reviews.text: Sun protection is what I wanted but it also helps getting out of a cold water tight wetsuit. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely flattering
customer_reviews.text: It looks and fits great. I bought it for a dive week in warm water so don’t know yet how it holds up with a bcd over it....but I was concerned it might be too small after reading previous reviews. I am 5 8 tall and a little fat. I got a medium The styling is v v flattering.
customer_reviews.author: MS Av DC

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful on ! I am allergic to the sun and it's perfect and great quality! Very sexy my husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lysa Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit
customer_reviews.text: 133 pounds. I like the fit. I have my concerns of it not being UV and protecting against sun exposure. Above the butt silver stripe is Nice decor but quite see-through
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: I look like a female Ninja Venom and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sooo, this is my first ever dive skin and I am very pleased with its performance so far. Excellent for tropical climates (worn over a bikini or bathing suit is fine). I am 5'6.5"- 155 lbs and I ordered a Small. I prefer things to be a bit form fitting so this works for me. I'm not a fan of the extra room in the mid-section area but others may find it useful.
customer_reviews.author: Shena J.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy ! Size is accurate !
customer_reviews.text: Fits and helps me get into the wetsuit. It's good for the price. I'm wearing it on a liveaboard so we will see how it holds up but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I need it for. It kept me from getting any cuts during a 10 mile obstacle course through mud and water.
customer_reviews.author: Urania Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Removed the additional breast padding the rest of the suit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lehonna

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it before the trip
customer_reviews.text: I went to Hawaii for snorkeling, I was glad I got my own gear without fighting with other group members to rent it. it was comfortable, and fitted me very well. No sun burn or skin contact problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A

customer_reviews.title: Good full coverage sun protection. Looks good on.
customer_reviews.text: Love the suit. The padding in the suit is positioned way too high to be useful at all. Had to cut them out.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think it would work for my body but it did and so love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big girl so 14. This fit perfectly, breathable material. It dried quickly. Kept me cool from the sun and warm from the water! Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kay

customer_reviews.title: It was great!.
customer_reviews.text: It was great! ...so much so that it got stolen off the porch while the other drying dive skins next to it were left behind. Looked and fit as expected and was very comfortable in the water while diving.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick P.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love it .. it looks just like the picture.. great material
customer_reviews.author: Ranoushah

customer_reviews.title: A little big on me but gets the job done of a modest swimsuit.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger size than anticipated. I decided to make it work but it is a good modest swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Maleeha Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this suit. We play water volleyball everyday. Even now when temps are in the 110 range. Keeps her covered and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not warm
customer_reviews.text: I did snorkeling with it and I was really cold it’s so thin that it does not keep warm at all. This is not a wetsuit I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ripart

customer_reviews.title: shipping slow
customer_reviews.text: okay for the money, not great. arrived to late for my trip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly, great product, kept the sand out! :)
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. fit like a glove, was comfortable. Others in the group were jealous They were sunburned, she was cool and protected. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Michael Chapman

product_meta.title: ZIONOR Full Body Sport Rash Guard Dive Skin Suit for Swimming Snorkeling Diving Surfing with UV Sun Protection Long-Sleeve for Women
feature_bullets: STRETCHABLE & ULTRA DURABLE...This full body skin suits are made from 85% nylon and 15% spandex for better body-fit and easy to wear under wetsuit.
FULL BODY LONG SLEEVE DESIGN & UV PROTECTION...Protect you from cuts, scrapes, stings and other things while scuba diving or snorkeling as well as keep the diver safe from the sun's rays.
LIGHTWEIGHT & FAST DRYING... The 0.8-1mm thick rash guard will fast dry when temperature raising or in dry surroundings.
USER-FRIENDLY...Front zip-easy to put on/off. Special stirrups wraps on wrist and feet to avoid the dive skins slip off.
DESIGN FOR WATER SPORT ... Available for different water sports, such as swimming, snorkeling, shorefishing in warm water condition. Please go through the size chart to get fitted skin suits.
